org.accada.reader.rprm.core.msg
Class TcpSenderHandshakeMessage

java.lang.Object
  org.accada.reader.rprm.core.msg.SenderHandshakeMessage
      org.accada.reader.rprm.core.msg.TcpSenderHandshakeMessage

public class TcpSenderHandshakeMessage
extends SenderHandshakeMessage

Class used for handshaking. The handshake parameters are internally handled as String. Thus it's evident to validate the values to have correct lengths and contents using the method isValid().

Author:
Andreas Fürer, ETH Zurich Switzerland, Winter 2005/06
